column1: '''''Mythlore'' 70''' is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal.
A "Letter" from [[Carl F. Hostetter]] is a response to the article "Gondolinic Runes" by [[Paul Nolan Hyde]] published in [[Mythlore 69
column2: ''Mythlore'' 69]].<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/languages.php Languages and Alphabets] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net Tolkienbooks.net] (accessed 27 August 2011)</ref>
